cmr.ponder.empty_snowman_cooler.text_1: Right-click a Snowman with the empty cooler to capture it
cmr.ponder.empty_snowman_cooler.text_2: Alternatively, Snowmen can be collected from their Spawners directly
cmr.ponder.empty_snowman_cooler.text_3: You now have an ideal cold source for various machines
cmr.ponder.snowman_cooler.text_1: Snowman Coolers can provide Cold to Items processed in a Basin
cmr.ponder.snowman_cooler.text_2: For this, the Snowman has to be fed with cold items
cmr.ponder.snowman_cooler.text_3: With a Snow Cake, the Cooler can reach an even stronger level of cold
cmr.ponder.snowman_cooler.text_4: The feeding process can be automated using Deployers or Mechanical Arms
cmr.ponder.smithing.header: Processing Items with the Smithing Press
cmr.ponder.smithing.text_1: The Smithing Press can process items provided beneath it
cmr.ponder.smithing.text_2: The Input item can be placed on a Depot under the Press
cmr.ponder.smithing.text_3: The Template can be placed by right clicking the top or the bottom of the Press
cmr.ponder.smithing.text_4: The Addition can be placed by right clicking the sides of the Press
cmr.ponder.block_spout.header: Filling Blocks using a Block Spout
cmr.ponder.block_spout.text_1: The Block Spout can modify block beneath it with fluid
cmr.ponder.block_spout.text_2: The content of a Block Spout cannot be accessed manually
cmr.ponder.block_spout.text_3: Instead, Pipes can be used to supply it with fluids
cmr.ponder.block_spout.text_4: The Input block can be placed under the Block Spout
